item.title: 全球对印尼债券的疯狂需求仍有空间
item.description: 如果从投资者的定位来看，本月大量外资流入印尼债券的情况可能会延续。【原文：The massive foreign inflow into Indonesian bonds this month may extend, if investor positioning is anything to go by.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特出售更多美国银行股票，获利 9.82 亿美元
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）又抛售了 9.82 亿美元的美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：Warren Buffett sold an additional $982 million of Bank of America Corp. stock as his conglomerate continues to shrink its investment in the second-largest US bank.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利 MUFG 和花旗上调目标价，乐天大涨
item.description: 摩根士丹利无印良品证券公司（Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. Ltd.）等券商上调了这家日本电子商务公司的目标股价，原因是其移动业务取得了成功。【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. shares climbed to the highest level since April 2022 after brokerage firms including Morgan Stanley MUFG Securities Co. raised their price target for the Japanese e-commerce firm on its mobile business success.】

item.title: 尽管华尔街走势低迷，但 Nifty 50 指数仍有望再创新高
市场宠儿 Abercrombie & Fitch 将全面回归香港
item.description: 服装零售商阿伯克龙比惠誉公司（Abercrombie & Fitch Co.【原文：Apparel retailer Abercrombie & Fitch Co., which has emerged as one of America’s hottest stocks over the past year, is planning a full-fledged return to Hong Kong eight years after it shut its flagship store in the city, according to people familiar.】

item.title: 美国波士顿银行将牵头为运营商部门交易提供 18.3 亿美元的杠杆贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）已承诺为 Lone Star Funds 收购开利全球公司（Carrier Global Corp.【原文：Bank of America Corp. has committed to financing a $1.83 billion leveraged loan for Lone Star Funds’ purchase of Carrier Global Corp.’s commercial and residential fire unit, according to people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified as the information is private.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴的 "连接 "会员资格或将成为海外股票的福音
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）即将加入 "股票通"（Stock Connect），这可能会在全球市场释放多达 32 亿美元的现金。分析师称，日本和美国股市是潜在的受益者。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s impending inclusion in the Stock Connect may unleash as much as $3.2 billion of cash across global markets. Analysts say that Japan and US equities are potential beneficiaries.】

item.title: Seven & I 因收购后采取保护措施的消息而下跌
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co. 的股价在东京早盘交易中下跌达 3.8%，此前有消息称，7-Eleven 商店的运营商希望日本政府将其名称改为一个类别，以提高 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. shares fell as much as 3.8% in early morning trade in Tokyo, following news that the operator of 7-Eleven stores wants the Japanese government to change its designation to a category that would raise any potential hurdle for Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. to move forward with its buyout proposal.】

item.title: 穆迪因美国调查而将道明银行评级展望改为负面
item.description: 美国对多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）洗钱控制措施的调查成本不断上升，给这家世界上信用评级最高的银行之一蒙上了一层阴影，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）紧随竞争对手，将该公司的评级展望定为负面。【原文：The rising cost of a US investigation into Toronto-Dominion Bank’s money-laundering controls is casting a darkening shadow over one of the strongest bank credit ratings in the world, with Moody’s Ratings following rivals in placing a negative outlook on the firm.】

item.title: 繁荣的印度一级市场吸引资金远离高价股
item.description: 印度新股发行的持续热潮吸引了全球基金的目光，他们似乎因印度二级市场的高估值而避而远之。【原文：The ongoing boom in new-share offerings in India has caught the fancy of global funds, who seem to be shunning the nation’s secondary market for its high valuations.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好英伟达（Nvidia）将发布万众期待的财报。美国银行客户从美股撤资数十亿美元。投资者通过期权权衡大选风险。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia to deliver eagerly awaited results. BofA clients pull billions from US stocks. Investors weigh election risks via options. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 美国库存减少，石油从技术性下跌中反弹
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国商业原油库存减少后，原油收复了周二技术面主导的部分跌幅。【原文：Oil pared some of Tuesday’s technicals-led decline after an industry report signaled lower US commercial crude stockpiles.】

item.title: 摆脱中国经济下滑的影响，福特斯库公司利润走高
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 全年利润增长 3%，原因是这家第四大铁矿石开采商经受住了最大客户中国对炼钢材料需求放缓的考验。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s full-year profit rose 3%, as the fourth-largest iron ore miner weathered a slowdown in demand for the steelmaking material from biggest customer China.】

item.title: 高盛从花旗集团聘用实力银行家泰勒-米勒
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）从竞争对手花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）聘请了资深电力银行家泰勒-米勒（Tyler Miller）担任其自然资源部门的合伙人。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has hired veteran power banker Tyler Miller from rival Citigroup Inc. as a partner in its natural resources group.】

item.title: 淡水河谷董事会打赌下任首席执行官将改善公司形象
item.description: 全球第二大铁矿石供应商淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）的下一任领导人将重点关注稳定生产和恢复与政府的关系，同时还要面对迫在眉睫的问题，包括解决 2015 年致命的大坝灾难。【原文：The next leader of Vale SA, the world’s No. 2 iron ore supplier, will focus on stabilizing production and restoring government relationships, while under the shadow of looming issues, including settlement of a 2015 deadly dam disaster.】

item.title: CVC正在洽谈投资价值30亿美元的物业管理公司Odevo
item.description: 知情人士透露，CVC Capital Partners Plc 正在洽谈对住宅物业管理公司 Odevo 的潜在投资。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is in talks about a potential investment in residential property manager Odevo, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 市场综述：美国对英伟达持观望态度，亚洲股市将下滑
item.description: 在华尔街经历了低迷的一天之后，亚洲股市将走低，交易商们将从英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to edge lower after a sluggish day on Wall Street, as traders look to Nvidia Corp.’s results for clues on whether the artificial-intelligence euphoria that’s powered the bull market has more room to run.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 60,000 美元，以太币在加密货币市场波动中下挫
item.description: 比特币跌破了 60,000 美元的水平，这是加密货币市场广泛回撤的一部分，其中包括第二大代币以太币的大幅下跌。【原文：Bitcoin fell below the $60,000 level as part of a broad crypto market retreat that included a sharp drop in second-largest token Ether.】

item.title: 芝加哥教师协会准备撤出 Wamco Core Plus 投资
item.description: 芝加哥教师养老基金（Chicago Teachers' Pension Fund）正准备清算其在西部资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：The Chicago Teachers’ Pension Fund is preparing to liquidate its investment in one of Western Asset Management Co.’s flagship bond funds, in an early sign of the potential fallout from federal investigations into the firm.】

item.title: 斯塔默重建欧盟关系，英国推动与德国缔结新条约
item.description: 作为基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）改善与欧洲盟友关系的努力的一部分，英国和德国正逐步达成一项重要的新条约。【原文：The UK and Germany are edging toward a major new treaty as part of Keir Starmer’s efforts to improve ties with European allies.】

item.title: 对冲基金套利策略在 PDD 创纪录暴跌中得到回报
item.description: PDD Holdings Inc. 创纪录的股价下滑为一种流行的对冲基金策略带来了收益，这种策略抓住了股票市场与公司债券市场脱节的机会。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s record stock slide delivered gains to a popular hedge-fund strategy that seizes on the disconnect between the stock and corporate-bond markets.】

item.title: JD Sports 支持的 Applied Nutrition 计划今年在伦敦上市
item.description: 运动营养、健康和保健公司 Applied Nutrition 正准备于今年第四季度在伦敦进行首次公开募股。【原文：Applied Nutrition, a sports nutrition, health and wellness company, is preparing for an initial public offering in London in the fourth quarter of this year.】

item.title: 第一量子公司要求赔偿巴拿马矿山铜矿的损失
item.description: 第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）正在就滞留在该公司旗舰矿山的一批半加工铜矿石寻求巴拿马方面的赔偿，这是就该公司已关闭的业务进行的更广泛仲裁的一部分。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. is seeking compensation from Panama for a stockpile of semi-processed copper ore stranded at the company’s flagship mine as part of wider arbitration over the shuttered operations.】

item.title: 狮门公司被养老基金起诉，要求阻止星空卫视分拆
item.description: 全球最大的养老基金之一起诉狮门娱乐公司（Lions Gate Entertainment Corp.【原文：One of the world’s largest pension funds sued Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. to block the movie and television studio from separating from its struggling Starz cable and streaming service via a blank-check merger.】

item.title: 美国海军承包商将支付 2,400 万美元以了结欺诈调查
item.description: 一家美国海军造船厂同意支付 2400 万美元，并承认与长达数年的欺诈行为有关的联邦指控，这些欺诈行为涉及夸大利润、误导投资者和审计师。【原文：A US Navy shipbuilder agreed to pay $24 million and plead guilty to federal charges linked to a yearslong fraud that involved inflating profits and misleading investors and auditors.】

item.title: Dish 母公司 EchoStar 可能需要出售更多频谱支持债券
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，EchoStar 公司今年年初提出了一项有争议的债务重组努力，该公司可能需要出售更多由其无线频谱支持的债券，以延长到期日。【原文：EchoStar Corp., which early this year tabled a controversial debt-restructuring effort, may need to sell more bonds backed by its wireless spectrum to extend maturities, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: S&P大选周期权意味着大幅走低的可能性更大
item.description: 现在，投资者要衡量美国总统大选前后的股市情绪，除了 Cboe 波动率指数期货外，还可以直接查看与投票期间挂钩的 S&P 500 指数期权。【原文：Investors trying to gauge the sentiment toward equities around the US presidential election can now look directly at S&P 500 Index options linked to the period of the vote, in addition to Cboe Volatility Index futures.】

item.title: 美联储开始降息后的下一步行动
item.description:
九月之后会发生什么？【原文：

What comes after September?

】

item.title: 天气导致作物状况恶化，谷物期货攀升
item.description: 芝加哥谷物期货上涨，原因是整个农业带天气较差，大豆、玉米和小麦作物状况恶化。【原文：Grains futures rose in Chicago on worsening crop conditions for soybean, corn and wheat amid poorer weather across the farm belt.】

item.title: GameStop 5 月份备忘录复兴导致零售参与率下降
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）周一公布的交易数据显示，GameStop 公司今年春季第二次成为 "备忘录 "聚光灯下的焦点，但却未能吸引零售交易商的追捧，他们曾在 2021 年让该公司成为家喻户晓的名字。【原文：GameStop Corp.’s second turn in the meme spotlight this spring failed to attract the herd of retail traders who made the company a household name in 2021, according to trade data released Monday by the Securities and Exchange Commission.】
